For anyone getting black screens and then crashing when trying to run SP, update your Nvidia drivers to the 310.54 beta, available here: http://www.geforce.com/drivers/beta-legacy
Also you should install the files located in the redist directory in the location you installed the game. After that set your time to +8 Beijing) and play. Worked for me so I hope it works for you.
